analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' @191b rnams kyi gzungs kyi rgyan ni /
translated: The Ornament of the Dhāraṇīs🔽

original: bcu po 'di dag ste /
analyzed: bcu po 'di dag ste /
translated: “Anantavyūha, these ten are the ornaments of dhāraṇī for bodhisattvas.

original: bcu gang zhe na /
analyzed: bcu gang zhe na /
translated: What are these ten?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: They are as follows:🔽the knowledge that teaches without hesitation regarding all doubts,🔽the gateway for the arising of the Dharma of the mind,🔽the inexhaustible teaching of the letters,

original: dogs pa thams cad la the tshom med par ston pa shes pa dang / blo'i chos skye ba'i sgo dang / shes rab kyi snang ba gzhan la lhag ma ma lus pa dang / yi ge bstan pa mi zad pa dang / don bstan pa rgyun chad pa med pa dang /
analyzed: dogs pa thams cad la the tshom med par ston pa shes pa dang / blo'i chos skye ba'i sgo dang / shes rab kyi snang ba gzhan la lhag ma ma lus pa dang / yi ge bstan pa mi zad pa dang / don bstan pa rgyun chad pa med pa dang /
translated: the uninterrupted teaching of the meaning,🔽the perfect and thorough elucidation of the infinite praise of the buddhas,🔽the expression of the infinite faults of affliction,🔽the teaching of the immeasurable praise of purification,

original: sangs rgyas kyi bsngags pa mtha' yas pa yang dag par rab tu brjod pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i skyon mu med par brjod pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i bsngags pa tshad med pa ston pa dang / dbang po thams cad la gzhol bar 'jug pa chags pa med pa dang /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi bsngags pa mtha' yas pa yang dag par rab tu brjod pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i skyon mu med par brjod pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i bsngags pa tshad med pa ston pa dang / dbang po thams cad la gzhol bar 'jug pa chags pa med pa dang /
translated: the unimpeded engagement with all faculties,

original: sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i so so yang dag par rig pa la 'jug pa shes pa ste /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i so so yang dag par rig pa la 'jug pa shes pa ste /
translated: and the knowledge that engages with the correct understanding that is approved by the buddhas.

original: rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu /
translated: “Son of noble family,

original: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzungs kyi rgyan ni /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzungs kyi rgyan ni /
translated: The ornament of dhāraṇī for bodhisattvas is as follows.

original: bcu po 'di dag go /
analyzed: bcu po 'di dag go /
translated: These are the ten ornaments of the dhāraṇī of the bodhisattvas.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don de nyid rgya cher bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so //🔽gang gis theg mchog dam pa 'di mdzes pa //
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don de nyid rgya cher bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so // gang gis theg mchog dam pa 'di mdzes pa //
translated: ” Then the Bhagavat, in order to teach just this topic in detail, spoke these verses:🔽“The four ornaments of the greatly wise

original: blo gros chen po rnams kyi rgyan bzhi ste //
analyzed: blo gros chen po rnams kyi rgyan bzhi ste //
translated: beautify this excellent supreme vehicle.

original: tshul khrims ting 'dzin de bzhin shes rab mchog /
analyzed: tshul khrims ting 'dzin de bzhin shes rab mchog /
translated: Morality, samādhi, and likewise supreme wisdom,

original: shin tu rnam des don dang de bzhin gzungs //
analyzed: shin tu rnam des don dang de bzhin gzungs //
translated: and the dhāraṇī of the meaning and the words.

original: de ni lus can kun gyi yid 'ong dga'//
analyzed: de ni lus can kun gyi yid 'ong dga'//
translated: It is the delight and joy of all embodied beings,

original: lus dang ngag rnams dang ni yid dag cing //
analyzed: lus dang ngag rnams dang ni yid dag cing //
translated: and it purifies body, speech, and mind.

original: de yi rnam par ltung ba kun chad pa //🔽'di ni tshul @192a *//
analyzed: de yi rnam par ltung ba kun chad pa // 'di ni tshul @192a *//
translated: It severs all their downfalls.

original: khrims ldan pa'i rgyan yin no //
analyzed: khrims ldan pa'i rgyan yin no //
translated: This is the ornament of those with morality.

original: lha mi rnams kyi nang du mkhas pa ste //
analyzed: lha mi rnams kyi nang du mkhas pa ste //
translated: The wise one is among gods and humans,

original: de yi smon lam ji ltar 'dod bzhin 'grub //
analyzed: de yi smon lam ji ltar 'dod bzhin 'grub //
translated: and their aspirations are accomplished as they wish.

original: nan tan snying por byed dang yang dag ldan //
analyzed: nan tan snying por byed dang yang dag ldan //
translated: They are endowed with the essence of practice.

original: 'di ni tshul khrims dag pa'i rgyan yin no //
analyzed: 'di ni tshul khrims dag pa'i rgyan yin no //
translated: This is the ornament of pure morality.

original: de yi ting 'dzin sgyu ma ma yin te //
analyzed: de yi ting 'dzin sgyu ma ma yin te //
translated: Their samādhi is not an illusion.

original: shes rab rnam grol de bzhin ye shes mthong //
analyzed: shes rab rnam grol de bzhin ye shes mthong //
translated: Their wisdom is liberation, and their insight is wisdom.

original: de yi mya ngan 'das pa sgyu ma min //
analyzed: de yi mya ngan 'das pa sgyu ma min //
translated: Their nirvāṇa is not an illusion.

original: 'di ni tshul khrims rnam par dag pa'i rgyan //
analyzed: 'di ni tshul khrims rnam par dag pa'i rgyan //
translated: This is the ornament of pure discipline.

original: tshul khrims skyon med tshul khrims rnam par dag /
analyzed: tshul khrims skyon med tshul khrims rnam par dag /
translated: Their discipline is flawless, their discipline is pure,🔽Their discipline is not rigid, nor is it lax,

original: tshul khrims sra sre ma yin 'dren ma med; ;de yi rang dga' de bzhin rang dbang yin //
analyzed: tshul khrims sra sre ma yin 'dren ma med; ;de yi rang dga' de bzhin rang dbang yin //
translated: And they are self-controlled and self-satisfied.

original: 'di ni gang dag tshul khrims dag pa'i rgyan //
analyzed: 'di ni gang dag tshul khrims dag pa'i rgyan //
translated: This is the ornament of those with pure discipline.

original: tshul khrims kyis ni sbyin pa dag par 'gyur //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyis ni sbyin pa dag par 'gyur //
translated: “Through discipline, generosity becomes pure.

original: bzod pa dag cing de bzhin brtson 'grus dag /🔽bsam gtan dag cing de bzhin shes rab dag /
analyzed: bzod pa dag cing de bzhin brtson 'grus dag / bsam gtan dag cing de bzhin shes rab dag /
translated: Patience becomes pure, and likewise diligence,🔽Concentration becomes pure, and likewise wisdom.

original: thabs dang de bzhin bag yod dag pa yin //
analyzed: thabs dang de bzhin bag yod dag pa yin //
translated: Skillful means and likewise conscientiousness become pure.

original: g-yo ba med cing brtan la shin tu gnas //
analyzed: g-yo ba med cing brtan la shin tu gnas //
translated: They are not fickle but stable and steadfast.

original: sa mchog thob cing rnal 'byor rnam 'phro med //
analyzed: sa mchog thob cing rnal 'byor rnam 'phro med //
translated: They attain the supreme bhūmis and are not distracted from yoga.

original: lhod pa spangs shing dgad sla gso yang sla //
analyzed: lhod pa spangs shing dgad sla gso yang sla //
translated: They avoid laziness and are easy to please and easy to nourish.

original: 'di ni gang dag tshul khrims dag pa'i rgyan //
analyzed: 'di ni gang dag tshul khrims dag pa'i rgyan //
translated: This is the ornament of those with pure discipline.

original: brtson 'grus 'bar zhing tshul khrims bsngags pa ste //🔽de yi sems ni nam yang gdung mi 'gyur //
analyzed: brtson 'grus 'bar zhing tshul khrims bsngags pa ste // de yi sems ni nam yang gdung mi 'gyur //
translated: They are diligent and praise discipline.🔽Their minds are never tormented.

original: de la yid la chags par 'gyur med de //
analyzed: de la yid la chags par 'gyur med de //
translated: They are not attached to anything.

original: 'di ni gang dag tshul @192b khrims dag pa'i rgyan //
analyzed: 'di ni gang dag tshul @192b khrims dag pa'i rgyan //
translated: This is the ornament of pure discipline.

original: 'jigs pa med cing mi skrag mi zhum ste //
analyzed: 'jigs pa med cing mi skrag mi zhum ste //
translated: They are fearless, not terrified or discouraged.

original: bsam pa nges shing zhi la yid rab zhi //
analyzed: bsam pa nges shing zhi la yid rab zhi //
translated: Their thoughts are certain, peaceful, and clear.

original: 'dir ni de yi bcings pa lhad par 'gyur //
analyzed: 'dir ni de yi bcings pa lhad par 'gyur //
translated: Here, their bonds are loosened.

original: 'di ni gang dag tshul khrims dag pa'i rgyan //
analyzed: 'di ni gang dag tshul khrims dag pa'i rgyan //
translated: This is the ornament of pure discipline.

original: grags chen sems ni las su rung ba yin //
analyzed: grags chen sems ni las su rung ba yin //
translated: They have a great reputation and a serviceable mind.

original: de ni dul zhing de bzhin cang shes yid //
analyzed: de ni dul zhing de bzhin cang shes yid //
translated: They are disciplined and have a mind that is well trained.🔽Here, their bodies are adorned with the major marks.

original: 'dir ni rang lus mtshan gyis brgyan byed pa; ;'di ni gang dag tshul khrims dag pa'i rgyan //
analyzed: 'dir ni rang lus mtshan gyis brgyan byed pa; ;'di ni gang dag tshul khrims dag pa'i rgyan //
translated: This is the ornament of pure discipline.

original: de ni ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed //
analyzed: de ni ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed //
translated: They do as they say.

original: mkhas pa de ni dag gi rgyan thob ste //
analyzed: mkhas pa de ni dag gi rgyan thob ste //
translated: The wise obtain the ornament of speech.🔽Their minds are always adorned with the absence of afflictions.

original: de ni nyon mongs med pas rtag sems brgyan; ;'di ni gang dag tshul khrims dge pa'i rgyan //
analyzed: de ni nyon mongs med pas rtag sems brgyan; ;'di ni gang dag tshul khrims dge pa'i rgyan //
translated: This is the ornament of pure discipline.

original: khyad par 'phags pa'i zhing ni legs par brgyan //
analyzed: khyad par 'phags pa'i zhing ni legs par brgyan //
translated: And the special field is well adorned.

original: theg pa mchog la sems can yongs smin byed //
analyzed: theg pa mchog la sems can yongs smin byed //
translated: They bring beings to maturity in the supreme vehicle.

original: gang phyir sdig pa thams cad mi byed pas //
analyzed: gang phyir sdig pa thams cad mi byed pas //
translated: Because they do not commit any evil,

original: rang gi skye ba legs par rgyan par byed //
analyzed: rang gi skye ba legs par rgyan par byed //
translated: They adorn their own lives well.

original: byang chub spyod pa rtag tu rgyan byed cing //
analyzed: byang chub spyod pa rtag tu rgyan byed cing //
translated: They always adorn the bodhisattva way of life,

original: byang chub snying po dam pa rgyan par byed //
analyzed: byang chub snying po dam pa rgyan par byed //
translated: And they adorn the holy essence of enlightenment.

original: stobs dang mi 'jigs pa dag rgyan byed cing //
analyzed: stobs dang mi 'jigs pa dag rgyan byed cing //
translated: They adorn themselves with strength and fearlessness,

original: nga rgyal med pas shes pa legs par brgyan //
analyzed: nga rgyal med pas shes pa legs par brgyan //
translated: And with knowledge, they are free of pride.

original: de ni byams pas sems can kun khyab byed //
analyzed: de ni byams pas sems can kun khyab byed //
translated: They pervade all beings with love,

original: mkhas pa rtag tu drang dang mnyen pa yin //🔽g-yo ni med cing sgyu med bcos pa med //
analyzed: mkhas pa rtag tu drang dang mnyen pa yin // g-yo ni med cing sgyu med bcos pa med //
translated: And the wise are always honest and gentle.🔽They are without deceit, guile, or pretense,

original: gti mug 'dod sdang 'jigs pas 'gro ma yin //
analyzed: gti mug 'dod sdang 'jigs pas 'gro ma yin //
translated: And they are not led by ignorance, desire, hatred, or fear.

original: de ni sgrib pa lnga po rnam par sel //
analyzed: de ni sgrib pa lnga po rnam par sel //
translated: They clear away the five obscurations,

original: bag @193a *// yod gyur nas rjes su dran drug sgom //
analyzed: bag @193a *// yod gyur nas rjes su dran drug sgom //
translated: And, being heedful, they cultivate the six recollections.

original: byang chub yan lag bdun dang lam sgom ste //
analyzed: byang chub yan lag bdun dang lam sgom ste //
translated: They cultivate the seven aids to enlightenment and the path,

original: mthar gyis dgu dang ting 'dzin bsam gtan byed; ;rnal 'byor pa ni zhig nas nges sems sbyor //
analyzed: mthar gyis dgu dang ting 'dzin bsam gtan byed; ;rnal 'byor pa ni zhig nas nges sems sbyor //
translated: The yogin, having passed away, is joined to certainty of mind.

original: de ni tshul bzhin dge ba chud mi gson //
analyzed: de ni tshul bzhin dge ba chud mi gson //
translated: He does not waste his wholesome actions, but is in accord with them.

original: dben dang shin tu sbyangs dang so sor rtog /
analyzed: dben dang shin tu sbyangs dang so sor rtog /
translated: He is secluded, pliant, and discerning,

original: 'phags pa'i rigs la dbang ni sgyur ba yin //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i rigs la dbang ni sgyur ba yin //
translated: And has mastery over the family of the noble ones.

original: chos rnams la ni the tshom med par gyur //
analyzed: chos rnams la ni the tshom med par gyur //
translated: He has no doubts about the teachings,

original: de la kun nas ldang dang 'gyod pa med //
analyzed: de la kun nas ldang dang 'gyod pa med //
translated: And has no agitation or regret.

original: de la ma rig gti mug mun pa med //
analyzed: de la ma rig gti mug mun pa med //
translated: He has no ignorance, delusion, or darkness,

original: bden pa snang ba yongs su shes pa shes //
analyzed: bden pa snang ba yongs su shes pa shes //
translated: And knows the knowledge that fully understands the appearance of the truths.

original: tshul khrims dag pa dmigs pa med pa ste //
analyzed: tshul khrims dag pa dmigs pa med pa ste //
translated: His discipline is pure and without reference point,

original: shes rab dam pa bsam gtan ting 'dzin dag /
analyzed: shes rab dam pa bsam gtan ting 'dzin dag /
translated: And his wisdom, concentration, and absorption are sublime.

original: gnyis bsal nas ni rnam par grol ba dag /
analyzed: gnyis bsal nas ni rnam par grol ba dag /
translated: He is liberated, having removed the two,

original: lhag pa'i nga rgyal med cing shes pa dag /
analyzed: lhag pa'i nga rgyal med cing shes pa dag /
translated: And has no higher conceit or knowledge.

original: dus gsum dag la ye shes mthong mi chags //
analyzed: dus gsum dag la ye shes mthong mi chags //
translated: His wisdom vision is unattached to the three times,

original: 'dod chags bral ba'i shes pas chos kyang dag /
analyzed: 'dod chags bral ba'i shes pas chos kyang dag /
translated: And his Dharma knowledge is free from attachment.

original: dag nas 'dir ni de la rlom sems med //
analyzed: dag nas 'dir ni de la rlom sems med //
translated: He is pure and has no conceit about that here.

original: 'di ni gang dag shes rab ldan pa'i rgyan //🔽shes rab kyis ni sbyin pa brgyan gyur te //
analyzed: 'di ni gang dag shes rab ldan pa'i rgyan // shes rab kyis ni sbyin pa brgyan gyur te //
translated: “Wisdom is the ornament of generosity,🔽Because it is not sought in dreams or illusions,

original: rmi lam sgyu ma tshol ba med pa'i phyir; ;bdag dang byang chub de bzhin sems can rnams //
analyzed: rmi lam sgyu ma tshol ba med pa'i phyir; ;bdag dang byang chub de bzhin sems can rnams //
translated: It purifies the three spheres of self, enlightenment, and sentient beings.🔽“Wisdom is the ornament of discipline,🔽Because it is like a reflection, an illusion, or an echo,

original: 'khor gsum po dag de dag rnam par sbyong //
analyzed: 'khor gsum po dag de dag rnam par sbyong //
translated: It purifies the three spheres of body, speech, and mind.🔽“Wisdom is the ornament of patience,🔽Because it is neither learned nor unlearned,

original: shes rab kyis ni tshul khrims brgyan gyur te //
analyzed: shes rab kyis ni tshul khrims brgyan gyur te //
translated: And always realizes the dharmakāya,🔽It purifies the three spheres.🔽“Wisdom is the ornament of diligence,🔽Because it is neither discouraged nor steadfast,🔽And is neither to be adopted nor discarded,🔽It purifies the three spheres.🔽“Wisdom is the ornament of concentration,

original: gzugs @193b brnyan sgyu ma brag ca 'dra ba'i phyir //
analyzed: gzugs @193b brnyan sgyu ma brag ca 'dra ba'i phyir //
translated: Because it is neither in equipoise nor not in equipoise,🔽And is neither to be adopted nor discarded,🔽It purifies the three spheres.🔽“Wisdom is the ornament of insight,

original: lus dang ngag rnams dang ni de bzhin sems //
analyzed: lus dang ngag rnams dang ni de bzhin sems //
translated: Because it is neither insight nor not insight,🔽And is neither to be adopted nor discarded,

original: 'khor gsum po dag de ni rnam par sbyong //
analyzed: 'khor gsum po dag de ni rnam par sbyong //
translated: It purifies the three spheres.🔽“Wisdom is the ornament of the perfections,🔽Because it is neither a perfection nor not a perfection,

original: shes rab kyis ni bzod pa brgyan gyur te; ;mkhas dang mtho min dma' bar 'gyur min dang // dam pa'i chos sku rtag tu rab rtog pa //
analyzed: shes rab kyis ni bzod pa brgyan gyur te; ;mkhas dang mtho min dma' bar 'gyur min dang // dam pa'i chos sku rtag tu rab rtog pa //
translated: And is neither to be adopted nor discarded,🔽It purifies the three spheres.🔽“Wisdom is the ornament of the perfections,🔽Because it is neither a perfection nor not a perfection,🔽And is neither to be adopted nor discarded,

original: 'khor gsum po dag de ni rnam par sbyong //
analyzed: 'khor gsum po dag de ni rnam par sbyong //
translated: It purifies the three spheres.🔽“Wisdom is the ornament of the perfections,

original: shes rab kyis ni brtson 'grus brgyan gyur te //
analyzed: shes rab kyis ni brtson 'grus brgyan gyur te //
translated: Because it is neither a perfection nor not a perfection,🔽And is neither to be adopted nor discarded,🔽It purifies the three spheres.🔽“Wisdom is the ornament of the perfections,🔽Because it is neither a perfection nor not a perfection,🔽And is neither to be adopted nor discarded,

original: skyo ba med cing bsam pa brtan pa dang // de ni blang ba med cing dor med pa //
analyzed: skyo ba med cing bsam pa brtan pa dang // de ni blang ba med cing dor med pa //
translated: It purifies the three spheres.🔽“Wisdom is the ornament of the perfections,🔽Because it is neither a perfection nor not a perfection,🔽And is neither to be adopted nor discarded,🔽It purifies the three spheres.🔽“Wisdom is the ornament of the perfections,🔽Because it is neither a perfection nor not a perfection,🔽And is neither to be adopted nor discarded,🔽It purifies the three spheres.🔽“Wisdom is the ornament of the perfections,🔽Because it is neither a perfection

original: 'khor gsum po dag de ni rnam par sbyong //
analyzed: 'khor gsum po dag de ni rnam par sbyong //
translated: And the three spheres are purified.

original: shes rab kyis ni bsam gtan brgyan gyur te //
analyzed: shes rab kyis ni bsam gtan brgyan gyur te //
translated: Concentration is adorned with wisdom,🔽And one becomes free from attachment, with insight,🔽And the wise one generates the superknowledges,

original: de la ma chags gyur dang lhag mthong dang // mkhas pa mngon par shes pa skyed pa dang // 'khor gsum po dag de ni rnam par sbyod //🔽shes rab kyis ni thabs kyang brgyan byed de //
analyzed: de la ma chags gyur dang lhag mthong dang // mkhas pa mngon par shes pa skyed pa dang // 'khor gsum po dag de ni rnam par sbyod // shes rab kyis ni thabs kyang brgyan byed de //
translated: And the three spheres are purified.🔽Skillful means is adorned with wisdom,🔽And one becomes skilled in the dhāraṇī gateways,

original: shin tu sdud dang gzungs dang yang dag smon //
analyzed: shin tu sdud dang gzungs dang yang dag smon //
translated: And one becomes skilled in the perfections,

original: 'khor gsum po dag de ni rnam sbyong zhing //
analyzed: 'khor gsum po dag de ni rnam sbyong zhing //
translated: And the three spheres are purified.

original: sems can chos dang de bzhin zhing rnams sbyong //
analyzed: sems can chos dang de bzhin zhing rnams sbyong //
translated: One purifies sentient beings, the Dharma, and likewise the realms,🔽And one purifies the buddha realms,🔽And one purifies the wisdom of the tathāgatas.

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag la dran mi 'jug /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag la dran mi 'jug /
translated: One does not engage in mindfulness in the applications of mindfulness,

original: yang dag spong pa rnams la gnyis med de //
analyzed: yang dag spong pa rnams la gnyis med de //
translated: And there is no duality in the right efforts,

original: rdzu 'phrul gyis ni lus dang sems kyang dben //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyis ni lus dang sems kyang dben //
translated: And through the bases of supernatural powers, one is free from body and mind,

original: sems can gyis ni dbang po kun mi shes //
analyzed: sems can gyis ni dbang po kun mi shes //
translated: And one is skilled in the faculties of sentient beings.

original: bdud dang nyon mongs rnams kyis zil mi non //
analyzed: bdud dang nyon mongs rnams kyis zil mi non //
translated: One is not overwhelmed by the māras and afflictions,

original: chos kyi rang bzhin tshul bzhin rjes su rtogs //
analyzed: chos kyi rang bzhin tshul bzhin rjes su rtogs //
translated: And one realizes the nature of phenomena as it is.

original: de bzhin lam la 'ong med 'gro @194a *//
analyzed: de bzhin lam la 'ong med 'gro @194a *//
translated: “The path is without coming or going.

original: ba med; ;'di ni gang dag shes rab ldan pa'i rgyan //
analyzed: ba med; ;'di ni gang dag shes rab ldan pa'i rgyan //
translated: This is the ornament of those who have wisdom.

original: de ni shin tu zhi bas zhi gnas shes //
analyzed: de ni shin tu zhi bas zhi gnas shes //
translated: “They know tranquility through complete peace,🔽And their insight is limitless.

original: de yi lhag mthong spyod yul mtha' yas te; ;chos kyi phung po ci zhig phung po shes //
analyzed: de yi lhag mthong spyod yul mtha' yas te; ;chos kyi phung po ci zhig phung po shes //
translated: They know the aggregates of phenomena to be aggregates.

original: khams ni nam mkha' mtshungs shing 'dra bar shes //
analyzed: khams ni nam mkha' mtshungs shing 'dra bar shes //
translated: They know the elements to be the same as space.

original: des ni stong pa lta bur skye mched shes //
analyzed: des ni stong pa lta bur skye mched shes //
translated: “They know the sense sources to be like emptiness.

original: rten pas bsags pas chos rnams 'byung med de //🔽don dam bden par 'khrugs pa med par shes //
analyzed: rten pas bsags pas chos rnams 'byung med de // don dam bden par 'khrugs pa med par shes //
translated: Things do not arise through accumulation.🔽They know the ultimate truth to be without disturbance.

original: tshul bzhin gyis ni nges par rtogs par shes //
analyzed: tshul bzhin gyis ni nges par rtogs par shes //
translated: They know the ascertainment of reality.

original: dus gsum la ni chags med ye shes 'jug /
analyzed: dus gsum la ni chags med ye shes 'jug /
translated: “They have unimpeded wisdom in the three times.

original: rnam par bzhag phyir phung po gsum yang shes //
analyzed: rnam par bzhag phyir phung po gsum yang shes //
translated: They know the three aggregates to be established.

original: dkon mchog gsum ni mtshan nyid gcig tu shes //
analyzed: dkon mchog gsum ni mtshan nyid gcig tu shes //
translated: They know the three jewels to have the same characteristic.

original: 'di ni gang dag shes rab ldan pa'i rgyan //
analyzed: 'di ni gang dag shes rab ldan pa'i rgyan //
translated: This is the ornament of those who have wisdom.

original: rnam bsgrubs mtshan nyid sgyu ma lta bur shes //
analyzed: rnam bsgrubs mtshan nyid sgyu ma lta bur shes //
translated: “They know the characteristics of accomplishment to be like an illusion.

original: yongs brtags rtsa ba rmi lam ji bzhin no //🔽rnam 'phrul mtshan nyid smig rgyu 'dra ba ste //
analyzed: yongs brtags rtsa ba rmi lam ji bzhin no // rnam 'phrul mtshan nyid smig rgyu 'dra ba ste //
translated: Like a dream, the root of all is thoroughly examined.🔽Like a mirage, the characteristics of emanations;

original: 'pho med chos rnams gzugs brnyan mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: 'pho med chos rnams gzugs brnyan mtshan nyid do //
translated: Like a reflection, the characteristics of all immutable phenomena;

original: 'du 'phrod byung ba mig yor lta bu ste //
analyzed: 'du 'phrod byung ba mig yor lta bu ste //
translated: Like an optical illusion, the occurrence of meeting and parting;

original: rkyen rnams kyis ni brag ca ji bzhin no //
analyzed: rkyen rnams kyis ni brag ca ji bzhin no //
translated: Like an echo, the conditions.

original: chos kyi dbyings ni rtag tu ma 'dres shes //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings ni rtag tu ma 'dres shes //
translated: The realm of phenomena is always known to be unmixed.

original: de bzhin nyid ni gnas med de rab shes //
analyzed: de bzhin nyid ni gnas med de rab shes //
translated: Suchness is well known to be without a location.

original: yang dag mtha' ni rtag tu mi g-yo chos //
analyzed: yang dag mtha' ni rtag tu mi g-yo chos //
translated: The limit of reality is always the immutable Dharma.

original: 'dus ma byas dang 'dus byas gnyis su med //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas dang 'dus byas gnyis su med //
translated: The unconditioned and the conditioned are nondual.

original: shes @194b rab zab cing blo ni rab yangs par //
analyzed: shes @194b rab zab cing blo ni rab yangs par //
translated: Having adorned himself with profound wisdom and a vast mind,

original: brgyan nas sangs rgyas chos rnams tshol bar byed //
analyzed: brgyan nas sangs rgyas chos rnams tshol bar byed //
translated: he seeks the buddhas’ qualities.

original: de ni nam yang dran pa brjed pa med //
analyzed: de ni nam yang dran pa brjed pa med //
translated: He never forgets the recollections.

original: chos rnams kun tu 'dzin cing 'dzin par byed //🔽don dang tshig 'bru la ni rtag tu mkhas //
analyzed: chos rnams kun tu 'dzin cing 'dzin par byed // don dang tshig 'bru la ni rtag tu mkhas //
translated: He comprehends and holds all the Dharmas.🔽He is always skilled in meaning and words.

original: nges tshig shes pa rtag par rtogs khong chud //
analyzed: nges tshig shes pa rtag par rtogs khong chud //
translated: He always understands and realizes the etymologies.

original: chags med tshig dang rtsub pa ma yin dang // rab tu grol ba'i tshig dang rdzun med tshig /
analyzed: chags med tshig dang rtsub pa ma yin dang // rab tu grol ba'i tshig dang rdzun med tshig /
translated: “They are not attached to words, nor are they harsh, They are liberated and speak without lies.

original: thos pa kun don rtag tu rtog pa dang // mkhas pa de ni ye shes rton par byed //
analyzed: thos pa kun don rtag tu rtog pa dang // mkhas pa de ni ye shes rton par byed //
translated: They always contemplate the meaning of all that they have heard, And those wise ones rely on wisdom.

original: nges don mdo sde rtogs par rab tu shes //🔽gang zag med pa'i chos nyid rton byed cing //
analyzed: nges don mdo sde rtogs par rab tu shes // gang zag med pa'i chos nyid rton byed cing //
translated: They fully understand the sūtras of the definitive meaning.🔽They rely on the nature of phenomena, which is without individuals,

original: 'jig rten 'das pa'i chos nyid la yang rton //
analyzed: 'jig rten 'das pa'i chos nyid la yang rton //
translated: And they also rely on the transcendent nature of phenomena.

original: de ni gzungs kyis brgyan bar gyur pa yin //
analyzed: de ni gzungs kyis brgyan bar gyur pa yin //
translated: They are adorned with dhāraṇī.

original: de yi tshig ni bden pa'i rjes su mthun //
analyzed: de yi tshig ni bden pa'i rjes su mthun //
translated: Their words accord with the truth,

original: gzung bar 'os dang dus su 'os pa yin //
analyzed: gzung bar 'os dang dus su 'os pa yin //
translated: And they are worthy of being upheld and worthy of the right time.

original: de yi chos bstan de ni 'bras bu yod //
analyzed: de yi chos bstan de ni 'bras bu yod //
translated: The Dharma they teach is fruitful.

original: phyed pa dang ni dus su rgyun chags 'jug /
analyzed: phyed pa dang ni dus su rgyun chags 'jug /
translated: They are discerning and speak in a timely and continuous manner.

original: de yi spobs pa mgyogs pa skye ba ste //
analyzed: de yi spobs pa mgyogs pa skye ba ste //
translated: Their eloquence arises quickly,

original: shugs can dang ni myur dang rtag mi chags //
analyzed: shugs can dang ni myur dang rtag mi chags //
translated: And it is powerful, swift, and always without attachment.

original: rgyun chad med dang 'khrul med nges pa'i tshig /
analyzed: rgyun chad med dang 'khrul med nges pa'i tshig /
translated: It is uninterrupted and has the certainty of correct words.

original: legs par brgyus pa'i phreng bas legs brgyan bzhin //
analyzed: legs par brgyus pa'i phreng bas legs brgyan bzhin //
translated: They are like a well-strung garland.

original: lha dang klu yi skad ni rab tu shes; ;gnod sbyin dag dang dri za lha min dang // mkha' lding mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye che //
analyzed: lha dang klu yi skad ni rab tu shes; ;gnod sbyin dag dang dri za lha min dang // mkha' lding mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye che //
translated: And also the languages of yakṣas, gandharvas, asuras, garuḍas, kinnaras, and mahoragas.

original: sems can kun gyi skad kyang rab tu shes //
analyzed: sems can kun gyi skad kyang rab tu shes //
translated: They know the languages of all beings.

original: 'khor lhags shes nas pa gong @195a *//🔽med pa ste //
analyzed: 'khor lhags shes nas pa gong @195a *// med pa ste //
translated: They know the assembly that has gathered,🔽And they are not intimidated

original: smra ba mthong nas zhum par gyur ba'ang med //
analyzed: smra ba mthong nas zhum par gyur ba'ang med //
translated: When they see the audience.

original: 'jigs pa med par chos kyi gtam yang rjod //
analyzed: 'jigs pa med par chos kyi gtam yang rjod //
translated: They speak the Dharma without fear.

original: 'dri ba rnams la nges 'byung rab tu shes //
analyzed: 'dri ba rnams la nges 'byung rab tu shes //
translated: They know the answers to all questions.

original: lhag pa'i nga rgyal can mthong snel zhi yi //
analyzed: lhag pa'i nga rgyal can mthong snel zhi yi //
translated: When they see those with excessive pride,

original: gtam brjod rnal 'byor mthong nas rjes su mthun //
analyzed: gtam brjod rnal 'byor mthong nas rjes su mthun //
translated: They speak in a way that is appropriate for yogins.

original: nga rgyal can la lag na rdo rje ston //
analyzed: nga rgyal can la lag na rdo rje ston //
translated: To those with pride, they teach Vajrapāṇi.

original: yul mngon chags la sreg pa'i bskal pa ste //
analyzed: yul mngon chags la sreg pa'i bskal pa ste //
translated: To those who are attached to objects, they teach the fire kalpa.

original: theg pa gsum gyi rim pa'i gtam yang brjod //
analyzed: theg pa gsum gyi rim pa'i gtam yang brjod //
translated: They speak about the stages of the three vehicles.

original: dogs pa kun gyi tha tshom gcod pa ste //
analyzed: dogs pa kun gyi tha tshom gcod pa ste //
translated: They cut through all doubts.

original: blo yi chos rnams mngon sum 'gyur ba yin //
analyzed: blo yi chos rnams mngon sum 'gyur ba yin //
translated: They have direct experience of the Dharma of the mind.

original: de yi shes rab nam yang gzhan mi ltos //
analyzed: de yi shes rab nam yang gzhan mi ltos //
translated: Their wisdom never depends on others.

original: yi ge thams cad rtag tu zad mi shes //
analyzed: yi ge thams cad rtag tu zad mi shes //
translated: And all the letters are always inexhaustible.

original: don rnams nges pa dag la rgyun chags te //
analyzed: don rnams nges pa dag la rgyun chags te //
translated: The continuous ascertainment of meanings

original: 'di ni sangs rgyas chos rnams mtha' yas brjod //
analyzed: 'di ni sangs rgyas chos rnams mtha' yas brjod //
translated: Is said to be the infinite qualities of the buddhas.

original: de ni gzungs kyis brgyan par gyur pa yin //
analyzed: de ni gzungs kyis brgyan par gyur pa yin //
translated: That is the adornment of dhāraṇī.

original: kun nas nyon mongs skyon ni mtha' yas shes //
analyzed: kun nas nyon mongs skyon ni mtha' yas shes //
translated: Knowing the infinite faults of the afflictions

original: rnam pa byang ba'i phan yon thug pa med //
analyzed: rnam pa byang ba'i phan yon thug pa med //
translated: And the infinite benefits of purification,

original: de bzhin sems can dbang po thams cad shes //
analyzed: de bzhin sems can dbang po thams cad shes //
translated: And knowing the faculties of all beings,

original: sangs rgyas gnang ba'i so so rig pa thob //
analyzed: sangs rgyas gnang ba'i so so rig pa thob //
translated: One attains the individual knowledge approved by the buddhas.

original: de ni gzungs kyis brgyan par gyur pa ste //
analyzed: de ni gzungs kyis brgyan par gyur pa ste //
translated: That is the adornment of dhāraṇī.

original: de yi yon tan 'di dang gzhan dag kyang //
analyzed: de yi yon tan 'di dang gzhan dag kyang //
translated: These and other qualities of theirs

original: bskal par rgyun chad med par rab brjod kyang //
analyzed: bskal par rgyun chad med par rab brjod kyang //
translated: Could be continuously described for eons,

original: yon tan mtha' ni rtogs par mi nus so //
analyzed: yon tan mtha' ni rtogs par mi nus so //
translated: But one would not be able to fathom their extent.

original: bam po @195b gsum pa /
analyzed: bam po @195b gsum pa /
translated: PART THREE

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po la bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po la bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said to the bodhisattva Dhāraṇīśvara­rāja:

original: rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu /
translated: “Son of noble family!

original: snang ba gang dag gis snang bar gyur na byang chub sems dpa' mun pa mun nag dang bral shing byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa spyod par 'gyur ba byang chub sems dpa' rnams gyi snang ba ni /🔽brgyad po 'di dag go /🔽brgyad gang zhe na /
analyzed: snang ba gang dag gis snang bar gyur na byang chub sems dpa' mun pa mun nag dang bral shing byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa spyod par 'gyur ba byang chub sems dpa' rnams gyi snang ba ni / brgyad po 'di dag go / brgyad gang zhe na /
translated: When they are illuminated by these lights, bodhisattvas are free from the darkness of ignorance and they practice the bodhisattva deeds that are completely pure.🔽These are the eight lights of bodhisattvas.🔽What are the eight?🔽

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: “What are the eight?🔽The bodhisattvas’ illumination is🔽the illumination of mindfulness,🔽the illumination of intelligence,🔽the illumination of realization,

original: dran pa'i snang ba dang / blo gros kyi snang ba dang / rtogs pa'i snang ba dang / chos kyi snang ba dang / shes pa'i snang ba dang / bden pa'i snang ba dang / mngon par shes pa'i snang ba dang / sgrub pa'i snang ba ste /🔽rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: dran pa'i snang ba dang / blo gros kyi snang ba dang / rtogs pa'i snang ba dang / chos kyi snang ba dang / shes pa'i snang ba dang / bden pa'i snang ba dang / mngon par shes pa'i snang ba dang / sgrub pa'i snang ba ste / rigs kyi bu /
translated: the illumination of the Dharma,🔽the illumination of knowledge,🔽the illumination of truth,🔽and the illumination of superknowledge.

original: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snang ba ni /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snang ba ni /
translated: “Noble son, the bodhisattvas’ illumination is

original: brgyad po 'di dag go /🔽rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: brgyad po 'di dag go / rigs kyi bu /
translated: these eight.

original: de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dran pa'i snang ba gang zhe na /🔽rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dran pa'i snang ba gang zhe na / rigs kyi bu /
translated: “Noble son, what is the bodhisattvas’ illumination of mindfulness?

original: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dran pa'i snang ba ni /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dran pa'i snang ba ni /
translated: Noble son, the bodhisattvas’ illumination of mindfulness is

original: brgyad po 'di dag ste /
analyzed: brgyad po 'di dag ste /
translated: These are the eight.🔽🔽

original: brgyad gang zhe na /
analyzed: brgyad gang zhe na /
translated: What are the eight?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: They are as follows:

original: sngon byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba chud mi gzon pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba  ma byas pa gsog pa dang / thos pa'i chos rnams mi brjed pa dang / don rnam par nges pa rjes su thob pa dang / yul drug gis mi 'phrog pa dang /🔽mi dge ba'i @196a *//
analyzed: sngon byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba chud mi gzon pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba  ma byas pa gsog pa dang / thos pa'i chos rnams mi brjed pa dang / don rnam par nges pa rjes su thob pa dang / yul drug gis mi 'phrog pa dang / mi dge ba'i @196a *//
translated: not wasting the roots of virtue that have been created, accumulating roots of virtue that have not been created, not forgetting the Dharma that has been heard, attaining certainty in the meaning, not being carried away by the six sense objects,🔽having perfect, vast mindfulness in order to abandon nonvirtuous qualities and perfect virtuous qualities,

original: chos spang zhing dge ba'i chos yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir dran pa rgya chen po phun sum tshogs par gyur pa dang / de dran pa phun sum tshogs par rig nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis chos kyi grong khyer srung bar 'jog pa dang /
analyzed: chos spang zhing dge ba'i chos yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir dran pa rgya chen po phun sum tshogs par gyur pa dang / de dran pa phun sum tshogs par rig nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis chos kyi grong khyer srung bar 'jog pa dang /
translated: and, knowing that they have perfect mindfulness, the blessed buddhas entrust them with the city of the Dharma.

original: dran pa sngon du 'gro bas chos thams cad la snang ba thob pa yin te /
analyzed: dran pa sngon du 'gro bas chos thams cad la snang ba thob pa yin te /
translated: With mindfulness at the forefront, they attain illumination with regard to all phenomena.

original: rigs kyi bu /🔽byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dran pa'i snang ba ni /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dran pa'i snang ba ni /
translated: Son of noble family,

original: brgyad po 'di dag go /
analyzed: brgyad po 'di dag go /
translated: these are the eight illuminations of the bodhisattvas’ mindfulness.

original: rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu /
translated: Son of noble family!

original: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi blo gros kyi snang ba ni /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi blo gros kyi snang ba ni /
translated: The illumination of the bodhisattvas’ intelligence

original: brgyad po 'di dag ste /
analyzed: brgyad po 'di dag ste /
translated: is eightfold.

original: brgyad gang zhe na /
analyzed: brgyad gang zhe na /
translated: What are the eight?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: They are as follows:

original: don gyi blo gros yin gyi tshig 'bru'i blo gros ma yin pa dang / ye shes kyi blo gros yin gyi rnam par shes pa'i blo gros ma yin pa dang / chos kyi blo gros yin gyi nyon mongs pa'i blo gros ma yin pa dang /
analyzed: don gyi blo gros yin gyi tshig 'bru'i blo gros ma yin pa dang / ye shes kyi blo gros yin gyi rnam par shes pa'i blo gros ma yin pa dang / chos kyi blo gros yin gyi nyon mongs pa'i blo gros ma yin pa dang /
translated: The intelligence of meaning, not the intelligence of words; the intelligence of wisdom, not the intelligence of consciousness; the intelligence of Dharma, not the intelligence of afflictions;

original: rigs pa'i blo gros yin gyi 'gal ba'i blo gros ma yin pa dang / byang chub kyi sems kyi blo gros yin gyi nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi blo gros ma yin pa dang / rlabs po che'i blo gros yin gyi dman pa'i blo gros ma yin pa dang /
analyzed: rigs pa'i blo gros yin gyi 'gal ba'i blo gros ma yin pa dang / byang chub kyi sems kyi blo gros yin gyi nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi blo gros ma yin pa dang / rlabs po che'i blo gros yin gyi dman pa'i blo gros ma yin pa dang /
translated: the intelligence of reasoning, not the intelligence of contradiction; the intelligence of the mind of awakening, not the intelligence of śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas; the vast intelligence, not the inferior intelligence;

original: sangs rgyas kyi blo gros yin gyi bdud kyi blo gros ma yin pa dang / snying rje chen po'i blo gros yin gyi sems can @196b la rnam par 'tshe ba'i blo gros ma yin pa ste /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi blo gros yin gyi bdud kyi blo gros ma yin pa dang / snying rje chen po'i blo gros yin gyi sems can @196b la rnam par 'tshe ba'i blo gros ma yin pa ste /
translated: It is the intelligence of the buddhas, not the intelligence of māras. It is the intelligence of great compassion, not the intelligence of harming sentient beings.

original: rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu /
translated: “Noble son,

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi blo gros kyi snang ba ni /
translated: the bodhisattvas’ illumination of intelligence

analyzed: brgyad po 'di dag go /

original: rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu /
translated: Noble son,

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rtogs pa'i snang ba ni /

analyzed: brgyad po 'di dag ste /

analyzed: brgyad gang zhe na /

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: They are as follows:🔽the realization of all phenomena,🔽the realization of the teachings given with a hidden intention,🔽the realization of the thoughts of sentient beings,

original: chos thams cad rtogs par khong du chud par 'gyur ba dang / dgongs te bstan pa rnams rtogs par khong du chud par 'gyur ba dang / sems can gyi bsam pa rnams rtogs par khong du chud par 'gyur ba dang / so so yang dag par rig pa'i shes pa rnams rtogs par khong du chud par 'gyur ba dang /
analyzed: chos thams cad rtogs par khong du chud par 'gyur ba dang / dgongs te bstan pa rnams rtogs par khong du chud par 'gyur ba dang / sems can gyi bsam pa rnams rtogs par khong du chud par 'gyur ba dang / so so yang dag par rig pa'i shes pa rnams rtogs par khong du chud par 'gyur ba dang /
translated: the realization of the knowledge of the discerning ones,

original: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zab mo rtogs par khong du chud par 'gyur ba dang / snel zhi'i rgyud bstan pa rtogs par khong du chud par 'gyur ba dang / spyi'i tshugs kyi rgyud bstan pa rtogs par khong du chud par 'gyur ba dang /
analyzed: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zab mo rtogs par khong du chud par 'gyur ba dang / snel zhi'i rgyud bstan pa rtogs par khong du chud par 'gyur ba dang / spyi'i tshugs kyi rgyud bstan pa rtogs par khong du chud par 'gyur ba dang /
translated: understanding the teaching of the continuum of the general structure,

analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rtogs par khong du chud par 'gyur ba ste /
translated: and understanding all the qualities of the buddhas.

original: rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu /
translated: “Noble son,

translated: the bodhisattvas’ illumination of realization

analyzed: brgyad po 'di dag go /

analyzed: rigs kyi bu /
translated: Noble son,

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos kyi snang ba ni / brgyad po 'di dag ste /
translated: the bodhisattvas’ illumination of the Dharma🔽is eightfold.

analyzed: brgyad gang zhe na /
translated: What are these eight?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: They are

original: sems can rnams la las kyi bya ba la 'jug pa ston pas 'jig @197a *//
analyzed: sems can rnams la las kyi bya ba la 'jug pa ston pas 'jig @197a *//
translated: the teaching of the engagement in the activity of karma for sentient beings,

original: rtan pa'i chos kyi snang ba dang / thar pa 'dod pa rnams la shes rab kyis ston pas 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi snang ba dang / lam shin tu bsgoms pa'i phyir sgrib pa med pa'i chos kyi snang ba dang / 'dod pa dang /
analyzed: rtan pa'i chos kyi snang ba dang / thar pa 'dod pa rnams la shes rab kyis ston pas 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi snang ba dang / lam shin tu bsgoms pa'i phyir sgrib pa med pa'i chos kyi snang ba dang / 'dod pa dang /
translated: The light of the Dharma of stability, the light of the Dharma of transcending the world, which is taught through wisdom to those who desire liberation, the light of the Dharma of the absence of obscurations, which is due to having trained very well on the path, and the light of the Dharma of the absence of afflictions, which is due to having eliminated the afflictions.

original: srid pa dang / ma rig pa dang / lta ba'i zag pa mi slong ba'i phyir zag pa med pa'i chos kyi snang ba dang / 'phags pa rnams kyi nges par gyur pa mngon sum du byed pa'i phyir 'dus ma byas pa'i chos kyi snang ba dang /
analyzed: srid pa dang / ma rig pa dang / lta ba'i zag pa mi slong ba'i phyir zag pa med pa'i chos kyi snang ba dang / 'phags pa rnams kyi nges par gyur pa mngon sum du byed pa'i phyir 'dus ma byas pa'i chos kyi snang ba dang /
translated: the light of the Dharma of stability, the light of the Dharma of transcending the world through teaching with wisdom to those who desire liberation, the light of the Dharma of the absence of obscurations through thoroughly cultivating the path, the light of the Dharma of the absence of defilements through not arousing the defilements of desire, existence, ignorance, and views, and the light of the unconditioned Dharma through actualizing the definite state of the noble ones.

original: glo bur gyi nyon mongs pa la shin tu rtogs pa'i phyir kun nas nyon mongs pa'i chos kyi snang ba dang / sems rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i phyir rnam par byang ba'i chos kyi snang ba dang / chos rnams shin tu nye bar zhi ba'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos kyi snang ba ste /
analyzed: glo bur gyi nyon mongs pa la shin tu rtogs pa'i phyir kun nas nyon mongs pa'i chos kyi snang ba dang / sems rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i phyir rnam par byang ba'i chos kyi snang ba dang / chos rnams shin tu nye bar zhi ba'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos kyi snang ba ste /
translated: The light of the Dharma of nirvāṇa is due to the complete pacification of phenomena.

original: rigs kyi bu /🔽byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos kyi snang ba ni /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos kyi snang ba ni /

analyzed: brgyad po 'di dag go /
translated: these are the eight lights of the Dharma of the bodhisattvas.

analyzed: brgyad gang zhe na /

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /

original: brgyad pa'i shes pa'i snang ba dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i shes pa'i snang ba dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i shes pa'i snang ba @197b dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i shes pa'i snang ba dang / dgra bcom pa'i shes pa'i snang ba dang /
analyzed: brgyad pa'i shes pa'i snang ba dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i shes pa'i snang ba dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i shes pa'i snang ba @197b dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i shes pa'i snang ba dang / dgra bcom pa'i shes pa'i snang ba dang /
translated: the appearance of the knowledge of the eighth-lowest stage, the appearance of the knowledge of the stage of stream enterer, the appearance of the knowledge of the stage of once-returner, the appearance of the knowledge of the stage of non-returner, the appearance of the knowledge of the stage of arhat,

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi shes pa'i snang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa'i snang ba dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mkhyen pa'i snang ba ste /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi shes pa'i snang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa'i snang ba dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mkhyen pa'i snang ba ste /
translated: the appearance of the knowledge of a pratyekabuddha, the appearance of the knowledge of a bodhisattva, and the appearance of the knowledge of a perfect buddha.

original: rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu /
translated: “Son of noble family,

translated: the appearance of the knowledge of bodhisattvas

original: brgyad po 'di dag go /
analyzed: brgyad po 'di dag go /
translated: is these eight.

original: rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu /
translated: Son of noble family,

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bden pa'i snang ba ni /
translated: the appearance of the truth of bodhisattvas

original: brgyad po 'di dag ste /
analyzed: brgyad po 'di dag ste /
translated: is these eight.

original: brgyad gang zhe na /
analyzed: brgyad gang zhe na /
translated: What are the eight?
